headline: LEYBOLD RBS-BCS ROOTS PUMPING SYSTEM 267 CFM

Manufacturer Leybold
Model WSU501/D65BCS
Pumping Speed 267.0 CFM (7,544.7 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.00E-4(En) torr (1.33E-4 mbar)

Refurbished YES

  • EIS system 40-65 (Electric indicator system)
  • IGS 40/65 (Inert gas system)
  • CFS 40-65 (Chemical system)
  • LSS 40-65 (Limit switch system)
  • Full drip pan
Year of Manufacture 1990
